snippet.title: Knack 2 - PS4 Gameplay | PlayStation Underground
snippet.description:
Let's play Knack 2 on PS4! Ryan and Sid leap into the co-op platformer to sample a section of stealth gameplay, and a combat-focused romp through a city under siege. See how Knack 2 has improved on the original with more varied levels, and a white-knuckle combat system.

Enjoy the show!
